description: Nash is a simple guy.  All he needs to be comfortable is some sunshine and fresh air...oh yeah, and a cock in the mouth would be nice!  TommyD shows up with some pineapple scented oil to give Nash a good lathering.  But when Tommy applies too much, a quick dip in the pool is the best solution.While drying off, Nash takes some initiative and gobbles Tommy's glistening wang.  This makes Tommy hungry for dick himself, and soon the guys are throwing down some firing hot 69 action.  It's a steamy, poolside experience with an explosive ending.Enjoy!
title: The Steamy Poolside Experience
